lead_paragraph: A Wisconsin newspaper is apologizing for a columnist who connected Minnesota Vikings star Adrian Peterson's child abuse case to beatings suffered by slaves.
snippet: A Wisconsin newspaper is apologizing for a columnist who connected Minnesota Vikings star Adrian Peterson's child abuse case to beatings suffered by slaves....

headline.main: Paper Apologizes for Column Tying Peterson Case to Slavery
headline.print_headline: Paper Apologizes for Column Tying Peterson Case to Slavery
